name: Statical
body:
### Welcome to StatiCal StatiCal is a very simple static calendar widget for WordPress. It allows the site author to specify a title, year, and month calendar to display. Optionally, one or more days may be highlighted. That's it! ### Installation 1. Upload the `statical/` directory to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory 2. Activate the plugin through the 'Plugins' menu in WordPress 3. Drag the widget to your desired location in the 'Appearance' / 'Widgets' menu in WordPress ### Styling Reference
Month Year
### Screenshots ![Admin widget configuration](https://github.com/zacwasielewski/StatiCal/blob/master/screenshot-1.png?raw=true) ![Site sidebar display](https://github.com/zacwasielewski/StatiCal/blob/master/screenshot-2.png?raw=true) ### Authors and Contributors Built by @zacwasielewski with feedback from @brianharrington. ### Support or Contact Having trouble with StatiCal? Umm...
tagline: Simple static calendar widget for WordPress.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
